entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
